channel.title: How to get free GTA 1 and 2
channel.description:
[b]Heylo everyone.[/b] Here are the free original GTAs that are now freeware, http://www.rockstargames.com/classics/
Just choose any of the games displayed, then scroll down to the bottom of the page, entering fake details or whatever, except your REAL EMAIL address so they can send you the link...
Have fun playing GTA 2 (2 0wnz 1)
